text: my name is Chris finan I'm the CEO of
Anan Anan started with security
practitioners these were security
researchers who were looking at you know
the evolution of security threats and
building new techniques to combat them
and so Anan was really born from
security practice and research and has
evolved into more and more automated
products that now Center on cloud
security challenges and and especially
delivering security that is provable to
meet compliance for the federal
government we want to meet users where
they are and govcloud gives us the tools
to be able to do that so we can be very
flexible we can uh address just about
any application I think for Anan the
best thing about govcloud is our ability
to build our platform on top of them in
a way that delivers value simply to meet
the user where they are so for Anan the
key use case for us is compliance
automation namely continuous compliance
Automation and what we want to do is
abstract away as much of the manual toil
as we can that's where we really deliver
business benefits because we can
dramatically lower costs and the time to
revenue to the government Market one of
the things that we do with our govcloud
environment is we automate many of the
controls the security controls required
to meet the federal cyber security
standard known as as fed ramp uh and
we're able to do that and we're able to
automate about 87% of 325 controls in
govcloud by leveraging those native
Services now what we found was that's
really helped companies meet that bar
but very recently we realized there's
another cybercity standard that we're
also able to meet and that's where even
more savings has been available to our
end users we've been able to
dramatically drive down the costs of not
just fed ramp but another cyber security
standard called
cmmc and we do that using automated
tooling that we built in AWS it can meet
those controls and it can automate most
of the documentation in those
environments all based on the Telemetry
and data that's available in that
environment from the user we work with a
SAS company company that has a SAS
product that wanted to provide their
services to the Dodd's Supply chain but
they had a problem in that they had
controlled unclassified information that
they were hosting in their Cloud
environments we created a secure
environment for them in govcloud we were
able to leverage tooling built on Native
services within govcloud to ensure that
that environment met the cmmc practices
that they would need to have that be
accredited and to meet the bar and then
ultimately they were able to extend that
across their other AWS accounts as well
well into their staging and development
accounts uh and so govcloud gave them
that tooling that they could use to meet
the production bar while also ensuring
that their costs were low because they
were shifting a lot of that security to
the left at Anan we've been able to
automate 100% of the level one cmmc
accreditation and we're very excited
that by continuing to leverage the
services available on govcloud and
especially some of the services that are
continuing to proliferate there we're
able to get to 100% of level two as well
within the coming months
